metadata.title: LP-E17 Battery Charger LC-E17 for Canon EOS M3, M5, M6, 77D, 200D, 750D, 760D, 800D, 8000D, 9000D, Rebel T6s, T6i, T7i, SL2, Kiss X8i Cameras
features: Our lp-e17 charger is 100% new and compatible with original item. Please confirm the model of your battery or camera before purchasing, 12 months warranty.
This lp-e17 battery charger has LED indicator, charging is red, charging completed is green.
Prevent overvoltage, overcurrent and short circuit protection.
CE Safety Certification, All safety features integrated.
Easy to use, Compatible with Canon EOS M3, M5, M6, 77D, 200D, 750D, 760D, 800D, 8000D, 9000D, Rebel T6s, T6i, T7i, SL2, Kiss X8i Cameras.
description: Model:Travel Charger Input: AC 100V-240V~50/60Hz Max150mA Output: DC8.4V--600mA Weight:50g Size:85*46*35mm
